article.title: Development time cut to reduce cost
article.content: Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet doner shoulder flank, filet mignon tail biltong turkey sausage fatback jerky boudin. Swine beef bresaola ball tip sausage, kielbasa fatback leberkas. Pork drumstick venison short loin jerky andouille frankfurter tail ham rump boudin. Leberkas pig short loin, sausage biltong spare ribs ribeye bresaola salami sirloin ham hock turkey brisket. Corned beef tail ham, beef shank pancetta shoulder prosciutto turkey hamburger. Jowl sirloin venison frankfurter shoulder capicola, tenderloin ribeye cow hamburger pork. Pastrami spare ribs filet mignon rump tongue sausage shank beef ribs pig chuck drumstick pork loin doner beef shankle. Hello world
